name: Input Switcher
description: Adds hotkeys to swap between input modes. Type /inputswitch in game for more details.

name: Cooldown Tracker
description:
A convenient way to view your skill cooldowns. Includes text notifications, sound alerts, and chat message alerts. Access settings through '/cdtracker'. 
Type '/cd help all' in game for a list of commands.
Refer to the README on the website for information.

name: Chat FX
description: Get the likes you know you deserve. Moving yellowtext. /!! <message>, disable with /!!

name: Persistent Chat
description: Stay on the same chat channel between zones.

name: Regen Timer
description: Keep track of regeneration and when you can sit to regen. /regenlock to toggle dragging

name: SFX Toggle
description: Automatically change graphics settings based on fps. /effect to toggle, /effect help for more commands.

name: Battle Mode
description: Disables UI interaction for easier combat when using mousemode. /bm to toggle
